name: Mobogenie
short_description:
Mobogenie is the personal manager of your mobile phone. Data transfer and management has never been this easy with Mobogenie. With Mobogenie, all the apps, contacts, SMS, music and other data in your smartphone can be easily transferred between PC, your phone, and even the online world.

What's new in the latest version?
1. A Download Manager on a Popup
2. Smart Updates  
3. Manage your Apps
4. An Enhanced Driver-finding Process

Key Features:
1. App Management
2. Contact Management
3. Media Management
4. SMS Management
5. Back up & Restore
summary: transfer android to pc, transfer pc to android, file transfer, sms bac
